# List All Review Attachments for an App Store Review Detail

**Web Service Endpoint**

List all the App Store review attachments you include with a version when you submit it for App Review.

## Reading Attachment Information

- **Read App Store Review Attachment Information**: Get information about an App Store review attachment and its upload and processing status.
- **GET /v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments**
